sn19.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn19.1:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
sn19.1:1.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yenāyasmā lakkhaṇo tenupasaṅkami;
sn19.1:1.6_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi.
sn19.1:1.7_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi.
sn19.1:1.8_0: Atha kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
sn19.1:1.9_0: “ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti?
sn19.1:1.11_0: Bhagavato maṁ santike etaṁ pañhaṁ pucchā”ti.
sn19.1:2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn19.1:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
sn19.1:2.2_0: “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi.
sn19.1:2.3_0: Ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti?
sn19.1:3.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
sn19.1:3.2_0: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā phāsuḷantarikāhi vitudenti vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.1:4.3_3: yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissati.
sn19.1:4.4_0: Pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto diṭṭho ahosi, api cāhaṁ na byākāsiṁ.
sn19.1:4.5_0: Ahañcetaṁ byākareyyaṁ, pare ca me na saddaheyyuṁ.
sn19.1:4.6_0: Ye me na saddaheyyuṁ, tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
sn19.1:4.7_0: Eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi.
sn19.1:4.8_0: So tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni
sn19.1:4.8_1: niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhaṁ paṭisaṁvedayatī”ti.
sn19.2:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ maṁsapesiṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
sn19.2:1.2_0: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.2:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi …pe….
sn19.3:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ maṁsapiṇḍaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.3:1.2_0: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.3:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sākuṇiko ahosi …pe….
sn19.4:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ nicchaviṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.4:1.2_0: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.4:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe orabbhiko ahosi …pe….
sn19.5:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ asilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.5:1.2_0: Tassa te asī uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
sn19.5:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūkariko ahosi …pe….
sn19.6:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sattilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.6:1.2_0: Tassa tā sattiyo uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
sn19.6:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe māgaviko ahosi …pe….
sn19.7:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ usulomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.7:1.2_0: Tassa te usū uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
sn19.7:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe kāraṇiko ahosi …pe….
sn19.8:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sūcilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.8:1.2_0: Tassa tā sūciyo uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
sn19.8:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūto ahosi …pe….
sn19.9:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sūcilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.9:1.2_0: Tassa tā sūciyo sīse pavisitvā mukhato nikkhamanti;
sn19.9:1.9_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūcako ahosi …pe….
sn19.10:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ kumbhaṇḍaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.10:1.2_0: So gacchantopi teva aṇḍe khandhe āropetvā gacchati.
sn19.10:1.4_0: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.10:1.6_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe gāmakūṭako ahosi …pe….
sn19.10:2.5_0: Yo ca sibbiyati sūcako hi so,
sn19.11:1.3_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ purisaṁ gūthakūpe sasīsakaṁ nimuggaṁ …pe…
sn19.11:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe pāradāriko ahosi …pe….
sn19.12:1.1_1: gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ purisaṁ gūthakūpe nimuggaṁ ubhohi hatthehi gūthaṁ khādantaṁ …pe…
sn19.12:1.2_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe duṭṭhabrāhmaṇo ahosi.
sn19.12:1.3_0: So kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane bhikkhusaṅghaṁ bhattena nimantetvā doṇiyo gūthassa pūrāpetvā etadavoca—
sn19.12:1.4_0: aho bhonto yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjantu ceva harantu cā’ti …pe….
sn19.13:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ nicchaviṁ itthiṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
sn19.13:1.2_0: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.13:1.4_0: esā, bhikkhave, itthī imasmiṁyeva rājagahe aticārinī ahosi …pe….
sn19.14:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ itthiṁ duggandhaṁ maṅguliṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
sn19.14:1.2_0: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.14:1.4_0: esā, bhikkhave, itthī imasmiṁyeva rājagahe ikkhaṇikā ahosi …pe….
sn19.15:1.1_1: gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ itthiṁ uppakkaṁ okiliniṁ okiriniṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
sn19.15:1.3_0: esā, bhikkhave, itthī kaliṅgassa rañño aggamahesī ahosi.
sn19.16:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ asīsakaṁ kabandhaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.16:1.2_0: Tassa ure akkhīni ceva honti mukhañca.
sn19.16:1.3_0: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.16:1.5_0: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe hāriko nāma coraghātako ahosi …pe….
sn19.17:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ bhikkhuṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
sn19.17:1.4_0: eso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhu ahosi …pe….
sn19.21:1.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sāmaṇeriṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
sn19.21:2.3_3: yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissati.
sn19.21:2.4_0: Pubbeva me sā, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī diṭṭhā ahosi.
sn19.21:2.6_0: Ahañcetaṁ byākareyyaṁ, pare ca me na saddaheyyuṁ.
sn19.21:2.7_0: Ye me na saddaheyyuṁ, tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
sn19.21:2.8_0: Esā, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosi.
sn19.21:2.9_0: Sā tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni
sn19.21:2.9_1: niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhaṁ paṭisaṁvedayatī”ti.
